channel.title: Katarina Öjefors Stark on The Swedish Pathogens Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Katarina Öjefors Stark on The Swedish Pathogens Portal

item.title: The pandemic has paved the way for data sharing
item.description: Details the importance of sharing data, tools, and techniques in the COVID-19 pandemic and for future pandemic preparedness. Highlights how this applies to this year’s Nobel Prize in Medicine.
